headline: Trump, emboldened after Ohio victory, faces challenges ahead
author: JILL COLVIN

The month will close with contests in Alabama  where Trump dropped Rep. Mo Brooks when it became clear the candidate was struggling in his Senate race  and in Georgia, where the governor's race poses Trump's biggest challenge.

On Tuesday, Republicans will vote in Nebraska, where Trump had endorsed Charles Herbster, who was seen as a strong front-runner through much of the race but is now fighting accusations that he groped at least eight young women at public events.

Trump's late-stage endorsement of JD Vance in Ohio's GOP Senate primary catapulted the Hillbilly Elegy? author to victory in last week's election, reinforcing the deep ties the former president holds among the most loyal Republican voters.

And while it appeared at one point as if the leaders of the party might reject him, Trump will again headline a major party fundraiser on Monday, this time speaking at a National Republican Congressional Committee dinner in Dallas.
